name: Before the Storm
description: Alvor has asked you to bring news of the civil war escalation to the Jarl of Whiterun. Tensions are rising and the neutral hold needs to be warned.

objectives.description: Speak to the Jarl of Whiterun
Report on the civil war situation

consequences.success: Gain access to Jarl Balgruuf and unlock further quests
consequences.failure: Whiterun remains uninformed about escalating tensions

complications: Bandits on the road to Whiterun
Guards may be suspicious of newcomers
Civil war tensions in the city
notes: This quest introduces the player to Whiterun and the civil war storyline. Post-Alduin timeline: Focus is on political tensions rather than dragon crisis.
